Title: GDPR Compliance Readiness Assessment
Review: Comprehensive GDPR readiness assessment including data mapping, policy review, and risk analysis. Typical cost ranges from $20,500 to $102,500.

Title: GDPR Compliance Certification
Review: Certification-only services for GDPR compliance. Certification fees range from $500 to $8,000; compliance-only costs range from $100 to $4,000.

Title: ISO 27001 Gap Analysis & Certification Support
Review: Gap analysis and preparation for ISO 27001 & ISO 27002 standards (standards purchase ~$350; consultant fees ~$38,000; gap analysis ~$5,700) plus surveillance and recertification audits ($20,000–$23,000).

Title: PCI DSS Audit & Remediation Services
Review: Services include SAQ support ($50–$200), vulnerability scanning ($100–$200 per IP), QSA-led RoC onsite audit ($30,000–$200,000), remediation planning, and annual maintenance ($5,000–$20,000).

Title: HIPAA Compliance Readiness Assessment
Review: HIPAA readiness assessment covering risk analysis, policy creation, and gap analysis. Baseline assessment ~$15,000; full compliance costs range from $80,000 to $120,000.

Title: SOX Section 404 Compliance Program
Review: SOX Section 404 internal control testing, documentation, and remediation services. Average annual cost ~$1,400,000.

Title: Environmental Compliance Audit
Review: Environmental compliance audit covering EPA, OSHA, and local regulations. Typical cost $2,500–$40,000; average $6,000–$7,500.

Title: ISO27001-P
description: End-to-end guidance, internal audit tooling, and auditor coordination for ISO 27001 compliance.

Title: SOC2-S
description: Automated evidence collection, risk mapping, and auditor hand-off for SOC 2 Type II.

Title: HIPAA-P
description: Gap analysis, policy pack, and breach simulation tailored for HIPAA covered entities and business associates.

Title: GDPR-E
description: Article-by-article readiness checks, RoPA generator, and DPO as a service.

Title: PCI-DSS-S
description: Secure code scanning, SAQ wizard, and on-demand QSA consultation for PCI-DSS v4.0.

Title: CCPA-E
description: DSAR workflow, data mapping templates, and opt-out signal handling for California privacy laws.

Title: NIST-CSF-P
description: Continuous control monitoring mapped to the five NIST CSF functions with board-ready reporting.

Title: ESG-S
description: GHG scope accounting, CSR metric dashboards, and limited assurance coordination.
